Html:
First, thank you for the great work on gmap.

I use gmap in my application to show a map with different markers. this circle markers showing the powerlevel from a radio in diffrent colors and different circle radius like in your demo when you double click in the map. now i want that the new marker, if is in the circle from a other marker and they have the same color, they connect to each other. can you tell me how i can do this?
